TEXT.TITLE: VSE CORP <VSEC> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 49 cts vs 39 cts Net 886,937 vs 892,323 Revs 25.9 mln vs 23.7 mln Year Shr 1.78 dlr vs 1.34 dlr Net 3,254,301 vs 2,472,676 Revs 100.6 mln vs 87.4 mln NOTE: 1986 4th qtr and year net includes income loss of MetCap subsidiary of 14,881 dlrs and 311,848 dlrs or 17 cts per share, respectively. 1985 4th qtr and year net includes loss in MetCap unit of 108,598 dlrs and 298,412 dlrs or 16 cts per share, respectively.
